text: Radio is a 2009 Indian comedy-drama film starring Himesh Reshammiya, Shenaz Treasurywala and Sonal Sehgal in the lead roles. The film is directed by Isshaan Trivedi. The movie was released on the 4th of December 2009. The movie has received praise for his portrayal of Vivan Shah. Category:2009 movies Category:2009 comedy-drama movies Category:2000s Indian movies
title: Radio (2009 movie)
